description: With its 190 km, the Göta Canal offers a unique paddle environment. The canal has both longer and shorter paddle-friendly stretches with many attractions along the way.
Here you can experience crystal clear water from your SUP board, while you breathe refreshing mountain air. At Åresjön, paddling is offered on remote beaches overlooking mountain peaks.
Float over the oysters and feel the salt in the air. On the west coast, surrounded by fine beaches and archipelago classic boathouses, you can paddle among cobs and skerries.
On the peninsula Kullen are Kullaberg's dramatic cliffs that stretch out to Öresund. If you are lucky on your side, you may encounter a seal or a porpoise during the adventure.
From Reimersholme you can discover Stockholm from the water by paddling to Kungsholmen and further towards the city center.
